alert.note: Alert for Johnston; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 5:27PM EDT until May 21 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wake County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Johnston County in central North Carolina... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 527 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Angier, or 15 miles west of Smithfield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Garner, Clayton, Knightdale, Wendell, Emit, Coats Crossroads, Flowers and Lake Benson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
